Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: One Oankar, the primal energy, realized through the grace of divine preceptor

lines.gurmukhi: pauVI 1

Bhai Vir Singh.translation: (kwmnW=dlIlW[ johY=q`kdy hn[ Dohx=DRohxhwr, T`g[ Cohy=kRoD[ pohY=cMbVnw[)
